lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it's a small way to contribute to the cause of economic justice in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a vision insurance company. I sit in a cubicle all day, working at a computer, processing receipts people send in to get money back when they have paid for an eye exam and new glasses. I don't make a huge amount of money doing this, but the company I work for pays for my healthcare, and I can pay my rent, have a good car, and always have plenty to eat. And, I have enough money to be able to give a little to those who don't have a lot.

lenders.name: Henderson Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hardworking people succeed and raise their standard of living.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young men who lack direction in life to become successful.

lenders.name: TOMMIE
lenders.loan_because: jesus says ,you do it for the least of these, you do it for me . i want to always  do my part to uplift someone  in need

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: hard working and honest micro business owners deserve the opportunity to grow their businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sculptor and have run my own business since 1992.

lenders.name: Marcia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of people to raise themselves up understanding that sometimes people need a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: We support organizations working to make Lincoln the healthiest community in the nation.

lenders.name: james
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a concept that really works!-- and that's a big deal in this world.  Also, to honor my parents who made giving a way of life.....

lenders.name: Nico
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.occupational_info: Just a regular college student. :)

lenders.name: Courtney
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Justin
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help make our world a better place.

lenders.name: MONICA
lenders.loan_because: It's my  way of helping to improve the quality of life for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students with learning disabilities.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility to help others who have the enthusiasm and commitment to help themselves find a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involved teaching high school teenagers about world cultures. They enjoyed tasting new foods and learning about the history of previous cultures and current cultures that we share this earth with.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: When I make a loan to parents, the children in these families will hopefully have greater opportunities in their future.

lenders.name: Marguerite
lenders.occupation: Retired, pt music and events coordinator
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others not only survive but succeed.

lenders.name: The Romberg Family
lenders.loan_because: Because we want to help people.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: All people deserve a chance to see Hope in their attempt to become independently secure. I feel it an Honor to be able to share with our brothers and sisters in every country,  around the world, the  opportunity to become self employed.
lenders.occupational_info: My mission is to see all people fed, while seeking freedom, peace, and  justice for all human beings..aka firep0w3r

lenders.name: Leanne & Codie
lenders.loan_because: To try to make a difference in the world

lenders.name: drewkie
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a start

lenders.name: rhonda
lenders.loan_because: to give is better than to receive
lenders.occupational_info: Import of tiles from Asia for distribution and sales within Europe and North America.

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.occupation: mom, wife and lover of life
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others because my church, The Summit, has a motto  ...Love God, Love People... and I want that to be motto of how I live my life.

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: With so little you can empower and change the life of others.

lenders.name: Lauge
lenders.loan_because:
Micro credit is the way to go!
Even I as a student can afford to help in this highly effective way.

I lend money so not to create donor fatigue and then lend them again once I get them back.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: we are all brothers and sisters. I need to give to those who do not have the opportunity that I do...  In my culture, I am broke, but compared to others I am rich, so, I give what I can in hopes that I will make someones life a little better, if only for a day...
lenders.occupational_info: I work with  children and adolescents who are dealing with mental illness, violence and an unstable family home.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: There is a wonderful mythical law of nature that the three things we crave most in life -- happiness, freedom, and peace of mind -- are always attained by giving them to someone else. -- Unknown
lenders.occupational_info: I answer phones, write letters and set-up mettings for the co-owners of a cellular phone company. The work is a little boring but the people I work with are fun.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: Anyone who is willing to improve their own situation by hard work and business, deserves our help.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: all the cool kids do it.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure cable television is delivered to homes across the world on time and within the highest broadcast standards.

lenders.name: Anthony ter Neuzen
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving some trust and a little help to everyone who needs it, especially when I can afford to do just that. The modern "professional" banking institutions seem to have forgotten about that basic principle a long time ago.
lenders.occupational_info: I work mostly in theatre and travel around the world with musical company's and bands.

lenders.name: Sanjay
lenders.loan_because: I am freelance Writer/Editor of Science Books. But I want to start my own Publication.

lenders.name: aniruddha
lenders.loan_because: i am needy & want to earn money more & more . we have no any type of financial support  and willing to work .
lenders.occupational_info: i have 10 sewing machines but not nay type odf financila help from anyone. we want to start work  with 10 persons so that we could earn the money and serve the poor also in the community

lenders.name: Renae
lenders.occupational_info: My work is very sociable as I get to talk to different people everyday and learn about their lives. My job involves serving people drinks.

lenders.name: Bruno
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Wms-Singleton Family
lenders.loan_because: we had the chance to do so through our church's "reverse offering."  Our church gave all its members money to make a difference.  We're happy to contribute in this way and hope to continue to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: We both work for social change.  David helps former felons; Verna teaches law students.  Our daughter is an activist in training.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have always had the good fortune of others believing in and supporting my dreams.  Giving back is my way of continuing this cycle.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English (reading and writing) to 7th and 8th graders (11 to 13 year olds).

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It's a new solution to an age old problem.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I make jewelry and glass art objects.

lenders.name: anne
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Abera
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bookseller.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that prosperity is everyone's God given birthright.  Prosperity comes in many forms, Health, Happiness, Financial Blessings to name a few.   I believe it is God's will that everyone should live a life of purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners build effieciences in the collections, disbursements and information reporting aspects of their companies.

lenders.name: Filar
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Holly & Graham
lenders.loan_because: We think everyone deserves a chance to fulfill their dreams and are proud to be a part of making it happen.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I both work for ourselves. I am a freelance photographer, & Graham is a contractor/handyman.

lenders.name: Elizabeth and David
lenders.loan_because: A friend gave us a gift certificate for our wedding. What a wonderful way to celebrate love and life.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: I have had many people help me over the course of my lifetime who I can never pay back.  Everyone needs help from time to time, so if I can help in some small way then I am able to perform the same kindness that was given to me. If my helping someone else inspires them to help others when they get a chance, then I will have been a part of a cycle of helping others that  will continue to produce some good in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from Verizon Communications where my job title was Service Technician.  I installed and repaired telephone lines and equipment for 32 yrs.  Now I am self-employed and have my own telephone repair and installation business.

lenders.name: Rajay
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinance is a highly effective means of helping those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I make investments in companies to faciliate their growth and enable investors to grow their asset base.

lenders.name: Karl
lenders.loan_because: I have money that I don't use, others can use them in the mean time.
lenders.occupational_info: Electricity construction

lenders.name: Cubano Palestino Santiaguero
lenders.loan_because:
"Hay hombres que luchan un dia y son buenos. Hay otros que luchan un año y son mejores. Hay quienes luchan muchos años y son muy buenos. Pero hay los que luchan toda la vida: esos son los imprescindibles. "


Bertolt Brecht

lenders.name: Françoise
lenders.loan_because: Try of ré balance the chances by looking to people who have projects the help which the life does not give them

lenders.loan_because: Good thing to do, Teach someone to fish etc

lenders.occupational_info: I am in medical school at Duke University

lenders.loan_because: When I needed a loan, others were there for me. So I would like to be there for others.

lenders.name: Magnus
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping hard working entrepreneurs helping themselves and their families to a better life. As a father I try to be a role model for my children and others by  making a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a car company as a project leader / engineer developing new cars.

lenders.name: Brian & Mary
lenders.loan_because: I want to help spread the world's wealth

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: looking after old people in a home

lenders.occupational_info: We help business and individuals become more successful via technology

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's an effective way to give people a hand up instead of a hand out, and it's truly productive toward overcoming poverty in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the office, I manage our computer network, I build a database, and I run event registration for an organization that trains Urban Youth Leaders.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I love the global spirit of sharing through Kiva! We place our humble contributions in the hands of brave, hard-working visionaries and build beautiful little bridges across nations and humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for the corporate world, which means that I make things that aren't very interesting or important seem very interesting and important. Confused? Me too, but it pays the bills and helps me to support Kiva. It's an honor to be a part of the Kiva community! With lovingkindness all things are possible.

lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance, as long as they are honest and hard working people...no matter who they are, no matter what their race is, no matter what their religion is.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Graphic  Designer & Photographer and I love what I do. I'm very happy to be able to help others and hope to do this for a long time....touching other people's lives touches my own in a wonderful way.

lenders.loan_because: we can ... !

lenders.occupational_info: We are the Jr. High  class at the Anchorage Unitarian Universalist Fellowship.  We raised money to fund loans by making host a soup and bread lunch.

lenders.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurship can change something in the world. I hope our loan can make a difference to these people and wish them luck with their business.

lenders.name: susie Q
lenders.loan_because: Exciting opportunity to help people help themselves !

lenders.name: Kika
lenders.loan_because: There are many people in this world who are striving to do well and I want to help them out! As long as I am able...I will!

lenders.occupational_info: I help artists get jobs and manage their careers

lenders.name: Travis

Happily married father of two wonderful sons. Business jet pilot,

We are all connected.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a disabled US Navy veteran. When I have the time and energy, I write articles, poetry and books and I act as a priestess in my community. I've worked with nonprofit organizations in my spiritual community and done interfaith work toward AIDS/HIV awareness and care.

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: i want to help people control their destiny.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an investor. I invest in companies that i believe have good growth prospects but that are substantially undervalued by the market. I seek a reasonable rate of return that will generate, over the long term, capital gains and dividends commensurate to or slightly better than that of the S&P500.

lenders.name: Raymond
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of helping others help themselves. What better way to do this than with microloans. lenders.occupational_info: I drive a 1 ton truck in northern Canada delivering general goods in the city of Prince George. I love getting to know my customers and being able to serve them and their business. I feel I am a part of each business team and enjoy providing them with  professional timely transporting solutions. My customers needs are always my number 1 priority and this is what has made my business successful. I offer 25 years of Courier experience in an ever growing and changing business environment.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: People need help. I can help in this way. Thank you for making this possible.

lenders.name: Briony

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the methods used by KIVA.  I have so much and this gives me a chance to give with trust that the help will go where I want it to.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to work in Public Health research.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.occupation: Illinois Army National Guard and college student

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone, even in a small way, to reach his or her goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a civil engineer who, along with architects, designs buildings and the property they lay on.   I currently live in Atlanta, GA, USA.

lenders.name: George

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.occupational_info: I assist individual and business clients with income tax planning and compliance.

lenders.name: Susan

lenders.name: Chris

lenders.name: Cynthia

Give up that pair of jeans you wanted to buy and donate that money you would have used and donate it to someone who really needs it to sustain their lives and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an occupational therapist. I help people who have been injured physically or mentally. I help them with their everyday tasks we sometimes take for granted.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: For my 7th birthday party I decided to ask my freinds to give a donation to Kiva instead of a gift. My friends and I do pay it forward birthdays and I really wanted to give to these people in need. (Sept 2007) I am now in Grade 10 and I'm still lending! (Sept 2015)

lenders.occupational_info: Onerous...

lenders.loan_because: I want to see everyone have an opportunity to succeed.

lenders.name: Megan

lenders.occupational_info: I have about 15 people who work for me. We answer phones and answer questions about dental insurance.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Judi

lenders.occupational_info: I deliver packages to businesses and residentials in central Oahu

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: To help and encourage people who wish to improve their lives and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with research to try to understand how the Universe began, what different things it is made of and how it has evolved. I also teach university students in physics.

lenders.name: elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, as others have helped me in times of need. You are inspiring.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with all different types of people.

lenders.name: Candy
lenders.loan_because: I have started up a small cottage industry, part-time, with hopes of it becoming a source of retirement income.  I know what I have accomplished to make it this far.  I want to pass on the sense of pride in creating a viable business, and help build the confidence that they can succees with the help of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach young children about creative thinking, teamwork and how to learn about the world through art.  They see me model it as I design and teach basket-making.

lenders.name: larry
lenders.loan_because: We are all better off in every way when we help others help themselves. Change one person and you change the world.

lenders.name: mzungu
lenders.loan_because: of love

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.occupation: Nurse massage therapist and designer, seamstress
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed in my life and I want to share my blessings with others.  When I got upsized out of my nursing job and the economy had a negative effect on my massage therapy job I was able to start a business called terirecycles with the help of my husband, I now sell off my website, terirecycles.com and at boutiques and street fairs.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide massage for peoples of all kinds, sick, dying and in good health with a few aches and pains.  I listen and provide healing touch.  My recycle business is about making things we all enjoy out of items we have either discarded or passed on.  It is about giving a new lease on life to a person or thing.  Doing anything with love and kindness makes the world go round!

lenders.name: Clara
lenders.loan_because: People reap what they sow.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: My experiences in developing countries are always in my heart, and have changed the way I think and act.

lenders.name: Bartholomew
lenders.loan_because: it is a small thing that can be very big, and it's something I can do right now.

lenders.name: Cleo
lenders.loan_because: I am so lucky to have the life that I have and I want to give others the chance to have a great life too.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I know my modest contribution will make a difference and through Kiva I feel like I'm part of the solution for a change.  Bravo to the founders and all who are making it work!
lenders.occupational_info: I retired from a job with a non-profit company that helps people achieve home ownership.  It is called Options for Homes and was started in Toronto, Canada.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because:
Because I believe that grassroots work is incredibly significant work.  Because there are mamas and babas all over the world who want a good future for their children.  Because the world is full of people containing all things good yet lacking in resources.  Because it is fun.  Because I miss international work and this is a way to be involved.  Because I can.

... And here is a shout out to RPCV's too. :) (Kenya 01-03)
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to talk to children and parents to ensure that kids are not being abused or neglected and are safe to live in their homes.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed!
lenders.occupational_info: I interview people and write articles about their lives.

lenders.name: Lou

lenders.name: SHANIL C.
lenders.occupational_info: I  am a Chef / Sales Consultant to the Food Industrie .

lenders.name: Mary Anne
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed, and I would like to share
lenders.occupational_info: I taught history to 16 year olds and loved it.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to give back to the world and help people get started in business.
lenders.occupational_info: I support computer systems to run business processes and find ways to solve business problems. My wife has started her own business from scratch and understands the challenges of getting started.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because:
It is such a fabulous way to make a difference.  As a small business owner myself I respect people who are looking for ways to improve their businesses and be self sufficient.  I appreciate having the opportunity to see the people wo are looking for loans and hear about their plans.  

I enjoy sewing, gardening, cooking, and farmers markets so these types of businesses will be the ones most likely to catch my eye.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies make sure that the medical devices they design and manufacture are safe and effective.  I do this by developing and delivering training classes for their employees, by performing audits of their business practices, by helping them design or improve business systems.  I've been in the industry for 32 years and am proud that our industry makes products that improve people's lives.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe that collectively individuals can help to make a global impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help make the internet a safer place by fighting cybercrime.

lenders.name: Tai
lenders.loan_because: I love to help those whose know how to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring truck load of products, goods and supplies materials etc... to companies and market distribution center nation wide or disaster area such as the city of New Orleans, LA and Gulfport, MS during Hurricane Katrina period.

lenders.name: Celiene
lenders.loan_because: I can.  It brings me great joy!

lenders.name: Felicia
lenders.loan_because: At some point in time in our lives we all need help.  It is an awesome responsibility to be a great steward over the finances with which God entrusts us.  I am grateful to be in a position to help someone us to fulfill their goals and their dreams.

lenders.name: Sridhar
lenders.loan_because: want to keep in touch with the world

lenders.occupational_info: I consult with people who want to start businesses and with businesses in transition.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the saying that "If you're not outraged, then you haven't been paying attention"

lenders.name: Nicu
lenders.loan_because: I loved the idea, from the first time I heard about it and I wanted to get involved. It is we, the little people, that have the chance to prove to world that things can be changed by the power of compassion, rather then by endless politics.

lenders.name: Sonia
lenders.loan_because: I have been inpired to give to those in need. If I can touch someones life and bring positive change it is very rewarding. It is our duty to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in injury prevention and safety in a high risk sport. I help with the development of updated safety equipment ,safety training and coordinate the delivery of medical services for injured employees in the thoroughbred horse racing in California.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: It's a neat idea

lenders.name: Michelle Gervais

lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a bar/restaurant in Manhattan, NY.

lenders.name: dan
lenders.loan_because: if I were in these people's positions (which any of us obviously could have been), I would hope that those more fortunate than me would be socially conscious and generous with their resources.  It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell large groups of mortgages from business to business which are securitized and sold on the US secondary market.

lenders.name: ARF
lenders.loan_because: when a single person builds a business that they value, they naturally become more interested in supporting the Rule of Law, and this benefits the entire world. This is also why I think it is better to concentrate my loans in a specific area rather than spread them over the world: when two neighboring entrepreneurs band together to support justice and law, the whole is greater than the sum of parts.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student studying electrical engineering. I hope to apply what I learn through entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Law-Nerd
lenders.loan_because: Somedays it seems as though no matter how hard I work, the judicial system is bigger than I am and wins far more often than it ought to. Since I can't always be successful, helping others keeps the balance.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people  with legal problems deal with the Court system to get custody or access to their children, when divorcing or separating from their partners.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am able. I hope it is the right thing to do. Time will tell.

lenders.name: roy
lenders.loan_because: Why not?  It can only help our world community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying in IT.

lenders.name: Kathrin and Rick
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in developing countries to realize their dreams of becoming entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, blessed to be born in the United States. While I am not rich with money, I have health and opportunity. When I can help others to achieve their goals, I do what I can. I admire spirit,  hard work and like to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for magazines, and I draw whenever I can. I sell my drawing, and look hard for places to sell my writing. With the internet to do business on, I don't meet the people who hire me, but I have drawn for customers all over the world. I work at what I love to do!

lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites, videos, and productions that include photography, music, video and graphics.

lenders.name: Cheryl L.

lenders.loan_because: If I were in their place I'd want a loan too.

lenders.name: Gary

I want to share what I have with People who do not have .
and to help where help is needed most.
Its always good to give
lenders.occupational_info:
I am now retired.
And now I have the time to look out and see all the hardship in the world.
And maybe in some small way I can help.

lenders.name: Debbie M
lenders.loan_because:
Too often we under-estimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around. -- Dr. Felice Leonardo Buscaglia

$25 is a new pair of pants, a haircut, a dinner out or a tank of gasoline for most of us. 
But my $25+ your $25+ her $25+his $25 changes the quality of life for someone who needs a hand up! WOW! Together it takes so little to do so much!
lenders.occupational_info: Lending through KIVA gives me the satisfaction of being part of a fast growing movement to improve lives and put an end to poverty. I'm proud to be a part of the KIVA community.

lenders.name: Keri & Pete
lenders.loan_because: we want to make the world a better place...

lenders.name: Pam

lenders.name: Bastian Family

lenders.loan_because: My dad said it would be a good thing to do.

lenders.name: Vanderhorst Family
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lenders.name: Sandy

lenders.occupational_info: I co-own a company with my sister, which makes custom precast concrete stairs.

lenders.name: the Flores family

lenders.occupational_info: social services

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.occupation: host of Synchronicity on 101.9 fm or www.citr.ca
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount can make such a huge difference. I love that this money empowers small business owners. It's not a hand out; it's not charity. It's simply an opportunity. I also love how I can keep loaning the same money over and over again. It feels really good:)
lenders.occupational_info: I host a weekly talk show that airs Mondays  @ 12 noon, Pacific time. You can listen live or to podcasts at   http://www.SpiritualShow.com

lenders.name: Marvia
lenders.loan_because: My small contribution will make a huge difference in the life of another.
lenders.occupational_info: I pastor one congregation and provide oversight for 4 missions in a remote coastal area of Panama. It's a life of daily adventures   as I partner with others in proclaiming the Good News in practical ways to many who are in need.

lenders.name: Alissa
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others, I hope to see others have a chance to succeed in  Life also...
lenders.occupational_info: I'm A Store Owner, i sell Household  Decor/ and antiques.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I had a loan to start my business, everyone should have the same opportunity.

lenders.name: Val & Sabrina and family
lenders.loan_because: In our lives we earned enough credit to be loaned monies for our business as well.

lenders.name: Jan

Fly airplane filled with passengers and cargo around the world.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I believe that microfinancing can have a much bigger impact on improving people's lives than all these investments by big corporates.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a German research & development company that provides innovative solutions in almost all fields of our lives. My job is in financial management.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: As a mother I enjoy helping others to support their families, because I know how worthwhile their hard work is. I choose the Kiva way to help because I believe it lets them maintain their dignity more than a donation would. When their loans are successfully repaid, they have the additional benefit of having begun the creation of a good credit history. Confidence and self respect can be built by the people who borrow, as they are able to gain more control in their lives. I am proud of the efforts they make under difficult circumstances.

lenders.name: Allyson
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women support their family.
lenders.occupational_info: Help business owners run and grow their businesses.
